alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Mission Valley to near Schroeder to near Goliad. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Ander, Oak Village, Mission Valley, Weesatche, Weser and Nursery. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 644. US Highway 59 between mile markers 648 and 672. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 802. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
